action.primary: Augments the Spleen and Stomach and Tonifies Qi

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Deficiency of the transformative and transportive functions of the Spleen.

notes: Testa Oryzae Chu Tou Kang develops from the tissue, the integument, originally surrounding the ovule. It opens the Stomach, descends Qi and treats occlusion.
Testa Oryzae Chu Tou Kang has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
Sucking Testa Oryzae Chu Tou Kang or taking it in decoction cures dysphagia.
Testa Oryzae Chu Tou Kang is burned, pulverized and taken with water to aid childbirth.
Testa Oryzae Chu Tou Kang removes undigested food and is particularly effective for severe food Stagnation.
